data.script:
<script>
    import {Box, Overlay} from "@kahi-ui/framework";
</script>

<Overlay.Container>
    <Overlay.Section
        orientation="horizontal"
        spacing="medium"
        padding_bottom="medium"
        padding_right="medium"
    >
        <Box>I am the first Box!</Box>
        <Box>And I am a sibling!</Box>
    </Overlay.Section>
</Overlay.Container>
data.title: Overlay Orientation
